screen.name: ChoiceBox
screen.title: Input
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 70, textsize[1] + 70) count = len(self.list) if count > 15: count = 15 offset = 30 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 30 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 20
if (650 > wsizex): wsizex = 650 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 30 * count) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint((1280-wsizex)/2, (720-wsizey)/2))

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
textsize = (textsize[0] + 60,textsize[1] + 60) offset = 30 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 107 wsizex = textsize[0] + 107 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 27, 64) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(13,textsize[1] + 40)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
textsize = (textsize[0] + 60,textsize[1] + 60) offset = 30 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 107 wsizex = textsize[0] + 107 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 27, 64) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(13,textsize[1] + 40)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (30, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (35, 0), size = (40, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 0), size = (150, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (235, 0), size = (328, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (568, 2), size = (100, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showOnDemand"), "notselected": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (30, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (35, 0), size = (40, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 0), size = (150, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (235, 0), size = (328, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (568, 2), size = (100, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showOnDemand") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 16)], "itemHeight": 30 }
